Body:
Before I have tried executing commands[like ls,reboot] via Node-Red service running in localhost in raspberry pie device,and It was success. here is the node diagram.enter image description here the device is connected to IBM Watson Iot cloud and it sends CPU Temperature to IBM cloud and displays temperature in a graph and at the same time It executes command too.

Now I have created a python script which connects the machine to IBM IOT server. And the script works fine
column9: the machine is connected to IBM IOT Services . Now I want to implement Linux commands[like reboot
column12: etc] to execute on the connected machines through another computer by using another python script via IBM IOT service data like org id
column15: etc! is it possible? if yes
column16:
how should I proceed with?

[NOTE: the connected machine doesn't have static ip address
column17:
and I don't want to execute command from localhost]

code of first python script to keep the system alive

output of first python script
